title: Minidoka National Historic Site: People
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     History & Culture     People              People         One of the over 430 mess halls handling over 9000 people. Johnson & Son  Families gathering around the dinner table was one of the customs that was changed when people were put into the Minidoka Relocation Center. Learn more about how family life was affected.   Family, Foods, and Dining  Â      The Empty Chair in its setting with one remaining string of cranes for company. Empty Chair Project  Learn about the memorial for the WWII Japanese American Internees of Juneau, Alaska. Visit The Empty Chair project.
